test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `duplicate-values()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-2
test-case.description: Invoke fn:duplicate-values() with a collation argument, although the function does not perform string comparison. For that reason, output is valid as well.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `duplicate-values("a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `duplicate-values("a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "a string"`.
test-case.test: duplicate-values(("a string","a string","a string"), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint") eq "a string"

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(duplicate-values(()))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `duplicate-values((1, 1))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `duplicate-values((-3, -3))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(duplicate-values((1, 2.0, 3, 2))) eq 1`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(duplicate-values((1, 2.0, 3, 2)), (1, 2.0, 3))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `exists(duplicate-values((1, 2, 3, 1)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(empty(duplicate-values((1, 1))))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(duplicate-values((1, 2, 2, current-time()))) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(duplicate-values(())) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-15
test-case.description: fn:duplicate-values() applied on an argument of cardinality exactly-one.

test-case.name: K2-SeqduplicateValuesFunc-1
test-case.description: Invoke fn:duplicate-values() with an invalid collation.

test-case.name: fn-duplicate-values-1
test-case.description: Test Bugzilla #5183, [FO] Effect of type promotion in fn:duplicate-values
test-case.test: let $input := (xs:float('1.0'), xs:decimal('1.0000000000100000000001'), xs:double( '1.00000000001'), xs:float('2.0'), xs:decimal('2.0000000000100000000001'), xs:double( '2.00000000001')), $duplicate := duplicate-values($input) return ( (every $n in $input satisfies $n = $duplicate) and (every $bool in (for $d1 at $p in $duplicate, $d2 in $duplicate [position() > $p] return $d1 eq $d2) satisfies not($bool)) )

test-case.name: fn-duplicate-values-1a
test-case.description: qt4cg/qtspecs#410: Converting doubles to decimals, fractional digits

test-case.name: fn-duplicate-values-2
test-case.description: duplicate-values() on a somewhat larger set of values
test-case.test: duplicate-values((1 to 300, 100 to 400, 29, 145, 20 to 50, for $x in (30 to 40) return xs:string($x), "foo", "bar"))

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-001
test-case.description: Test fn:duplicate-values on a mixture of numeric types containing several NaN values.
test-case.test: count(duplicate-values((xs:integer("3"), xs:float("3"), xs:float("NaN"), xs:double("3"), xs:double("NaN"), xs:decimal("3"), xs:float("3"))))

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-002
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with a mix of types
test-case.test: declare function local:create($arg) as xs:anyAtomicType* { ( if ($arg castable as xs:untypedAtomic) then $arg cast as xs:untypedAtomic else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:dateTime) then $arg cast as xs:dateTime else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:date) then $arg cast as xs:date else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:time) then $arg cast as xs:time else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:time) then $arg cast as xs:time else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:duration) then $arg cast as xs:duration else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:yearMonthDuration) then $arg cast as xs:yearMonthDuration else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:dayTimeDuration) then $arg cast as xs:dayTimeDuration else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:float) then $arg cast as xs:float else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:double) then $arg cast as xs:double else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:decimal) then $arg cast as xs:decimal else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:integer) then $arg cast as xs:integer else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:nonPositiveInteger) then $arg cast as xs:nonPositiveInteger else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:negativeInteger) then $arg cast as xs:negativeInteger else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:long) then $arg cast as xs:long else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:int) then $arg cast as xs:int else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:short) then $arg cast as xs:short else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:byte) then $arg cast as xs:byte else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:byte) then $arg cast as xs:byte else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:nonNegativeInteger) then $arg cast as xs:nonNegativeInteger else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:unsignedLong) then $arg cast as xs:unsignedLong else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:unsignedInt) then $arg cast as xs:unsignedInt else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:unsignedShort) then $arg cast as xs:unsignedShort else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:unsignedByte) then $arg cast as xs:unsignedByte else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:positiveInteger) then $arg cast as xs:positiveInteger else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:gYearMonth) then $arg cast as xs:gYearMonth else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:gYear) then $arg cast as xs:gYear else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:gMonthDay) then $arg cast as xs:gMonthDay else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:gDay) then $arg cast as xs:gDay else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:gMonth) then $arg cast as xs:gMonth else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:string) then $arg cast as xs:string else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:normalizedString) then $arg cast as xs:normalizedString else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:token) then $arg cast as xs:token else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:language) then $arg cast as xs:language else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:NMTOKEN) then $arg cast as xs:NMTOKEN else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:Name) then $arg cast as xs:Name else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:NCName) then $arg cast as xs:NCName else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:ID) then $arg cast as xs:ID else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:IDREF) then $arg cast as xs:IDREF else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:ENTITY) then $arg cast as xs:ENTITY else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:boolean) then $arg cast as xs:boolean else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:base64Binary) then $arg cast as xs:base64Binary else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:hexBinary) then $arg cast as xs:hexBinary else () ), ( if ($arg castable as xs:QName) then $arg cast as xs:QName else () ) }; for $value in fn:duplicate-values( ( local:create(0), local:create(-1), local:create(1), local:create(3.141), local:create(3.141e0), local:create(3.333), local:create(3.141e0), local:create(3.333e2), local:create('NaN'), local:create('zero'), local:create('false'), local:create('true'), local:create('http://www.example.com/'), local:create('2008-06-01'), local:create('1972-06-01Z'), local:create('2008-06-01T12:00:00'), local:create('1972-06-01T12:00:00+01:00'), local:create('00:00:00'), local:create('12:00:00'), local:create('2008'), local:create('1972Z'), local:create('--06'), local:create('--12Z'), local:create('2008-06'), local:create('1972-12Z'), local:create('--06-01'), local:create('--12-15Z'), local:create('---01'), local:create('---15Z'), local:create('P20Y15M'), local:create('P10Y15M'), local:create('-P2DT15H0M0S'), local:create('-P1DT15H0M0S'), local:create(fn:QName("http://www.example.com/example", "person")), local:create(fn:QName("http://www.example.com/example", "ht:person")), local:create('-P2DT15H0M0S'), local:create('FFFEFDFC'), local:create('aGVsbG8=') )) order by string($value) return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-003
test-case.description: Test with static context dependant values

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-004
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:date
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values( ( xs:date('2008-06-01'), xs:date('2008-06-01'), xs:date('2012-06-01'), xs:date('1918-11-11Z'), xs:date('1972-06-01Z'), xs:date('1972-06-01Z') )) order by $value return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-005
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:dateTime
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values(( xs:dateTime('2008-06-01T12:00:00'), xs:dateTime('2008-06-01T12:00:00'), xs:dateTime('2008-06-01T00:00:00'), xs:dateTime('2008-06-02T00:00:00'), xs:dateTime('1918-11-11T11:00:00Z'), xs:dateTime('1972-06-01T13:00:00Z'), xs:dateTime('1972-06-01T13:00:00Z') )) order by $value return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-006
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:time
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values(( xs:time('12:00:00'), xs:time('11:00:00'), xs:time('12:00:00'))) order by $value return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-007
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:time

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-008
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:hexBinary
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values(( xs:hexBinary('FFFF'), xs:hexBinary('FFFF'), xs:hexBinary('FFFE'), xs:hexBinary('FF'))) order by string($value) return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-009
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:base64Binary
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values(( xs:base64Binary('aGVsbG8NCg=='), xs:base64Binary('aGVsbG8NCg=='), xs:base64Binary('aGFsbG8NCg=='), xs:base64Binary('aGVsbG8NCg=='), xs:base64Binary('aGkNCg=='))) order by string($value) return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-010
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:untypedAtomic
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values(( xs:untypedAtomic('a'), xs:untypedAtomic('a'), xs:untypedAtomic('b'), xs:untypedAtomic(''))) order by string($value) return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-011
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:string

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-012
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:gYear

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-013
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with durations
test-case.test: for $value in fn:duplicate-values(( xs:dayTimeDuration('P0D'), xs:yearMonthDuration('P0Y'), xs:duration('P0Y'), xs:duration('P0Y'), xs:yearMonthDuration('P0Y'), xs:dayTimeDuration('P0D'), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D'), xs:yearMonthDuration('P1Y'), xs:duration('P1Y'))) order by string($value) return $value

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-014
test-case.description: test fn:duplicate-values with xs:gMnnthDay

test-case.name: cbcl-duplicate-values-016
test-case.description: Tests duplicate values with unknown, but unneeded collation
test-case.test: for $x in 65 to 75 return duplicate-values(1 to 10,codepoints-to-string($x to $x+10))

test-case.name: duplicate-values-401
test-case.description: Collation set to ()

test-case.name: duplicate-values-402
test-case.description: Collation set to ()

test-case.name: duplicate-values-403
test-case.description: Collation set to () dynamically
